languages.text: "Ты поступил, как подобает лояльному сыну Империума".

traits.locale_text: "Ты поступил, как подобает лояльному сыну Империума".

languages.text: "You acted as a loyal son of the Imperium should."
languages.original_text: "Ты поступил, как подобает лояльному сыну Империума".

traits.locale_text: "You acted like a loyal son of the Imperium should."
"You acted like a loyal son of the Imperium should."
"You acted as a loyal son of the Imperium should."
"You acted as a loyal son of the Imperium should."
"You acted as a loyal son of the Imperium should."

languages.text: “你做了忠诚的帝国之子该做的事情。”
languages.original_text: "You acted as a loyal son of the Imperium should."

traits.locale_text: “你做了忠诚的帝国之子该做的事情。”

languages.text: «Actuó como debería cualquier hijo fiel del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "You acted as a loyal son of the Imperium should."

traits.locale_text: «Actuó como debería cualquier hijo fiel del Imperium».

languages.text: 「お前は帝国の忠実な子として行動したのだ」
languages.original_text: "You acted as a loyal son of the Imperium should."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は帝国の忠実な子として行動したのだ」

languages.text: "Ihr habt Euch verhalten, wie ein treuer Sohn des Imperiums es tun sollte."
languages.original_text: "You acted as a loyal son of the Imperium should."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Euch verhalten, wie ein treuer Sohn des Imperiums es tun sollte."

languages.text: « Vous avez agi comme n'importe quel autre fils fidèle de l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "You acted as a loyal son of the Imperium should."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez agi comme n'importe quel autre fils fidèle de l'Imperium. »

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'un sadık bir evladı nasıl davranmalıysa öyle davranmışsın."
languages.original_text: "You acted as a loyal son of the Imperium should."

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk'un sadık bir evladının nasıl davranması gerekiyorsa öyle davrandın."
